nodes.text: Originally posted by voiceofreason When other people quote statistics that you disagree with you say statistics is a game? When you quote statistics like your claim that cost of Canada's gun registration program was underestimated by 49,000% you expect us to take you seriously? Hypocritical to say the least.
Yeah, yeah we can all do math. Why do you even bother? You said statistics is just a game. -VOR Take it seriously.
